Convert MSDRGs in a "base group" and a complication level

Convert MSDRGs in a "base group" and a complication level

separate_drgs(drgs)

Arguments

drgs

character vector of MSDRG descriptions, e.g. MSDRGDSC

Value

a tibble with three columns: msdrg: the input vector, base_msdrg, and msdrg_complication

Examples

MSDRGs <- c("ACUTE LEUKEMIA W/O MAJOR O.R. PROCEDURE W CC",
            "ACUTE LEUKEMIA W/O MAJOR O.R. PROCEDURE W MCC",
            "ACUTE LEUKEMIA W/O MAJOR O.R. PROCEDURE W/O CC/MCC")
separate_drgs(MSDRGs)
#> # A tibble: 3 x 3
#>   msdrg                           base_msdrg                  msdrg_complicati…
#>   <chr>                           <chr>                       <chr>            
#> 1 ACUTE LEUKEMIA W/O MAJOR O.R. … ACUTE LEUKEMIA W/O MAJOR O… complication     
#> 2 ACUTE LEUKEMIA W/O MAJOR O.R. … ACUTE LEUKEMIA W/O MAJOR O… major complicati…
#> 3 ACUTE LEUKEMIA W/O MAJOR O.R. … ACUTE LEUKEMIA W/O MAJOR O… absent complicat…
